remarks: Value of the ring unit in a structure family product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2015.)
statement:
prds1.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prds1.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prds1.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prds1.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> Ring ) $.
prds1 $p |- ( ph -> ( 1r o. R ) = ( 1r ` Y ) ) $.
